formattedAddress: 113 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 113 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Everyone at Metro sports PT is fantastic. I came in with a stress injury from running and worked with Sejal to get back on my feet. She takes time to understand your workout habits and future goals and adjusts your PT to best fit your routine. She gives a lot of tips and exercises that are easy to continue at home or in the gym outside of PT- she will walk you through how to work a weight machine if it’s new in your routine. Everyone at the office is very personable and it makes the PT process fun. It’s like having a team cheering you on every step of the process. I am planning to run my first marathon this year and feel very set up for success after being injured in my training last year. I couldn’t recommend Sejal and the team here more!

originalText.text: I have come to MetroSports for 2 injuries over the past few years and they provide the best PT service by far. The whole team at 23rd St is amazing- everything from the admin to the PTs and assistants. Kim, Lauren, Alexis, and Amia- you are the best!!

text.text: I have come to MetroSports for 2 injuries over the past few years and they provide the best PT service by far. The whole team at 23rd St is amazing- everything from the admin to the PTs and assistants. Kim, Lauren, Alexis, and Amia- you are the best!!

originalText.text: Saved me from surgery and multiple injections    Knee, shoulder , back…enabling me to be a more independent senior.  Sejal, Lauren,Kim are amazing therapists and office staff makes it a completely comfortable and friendly environment while healing.

text.text: Saved me from surgery and multiple injections    Knee, shoulder , back…enabling me to be a more independent senior.  Sejal, Lauren,Kim are amazing therapists and office staff makes it a completely comfortable and friendly environment while healing.

originalText.text: I Highly recommend Metro Sports Physical Therapy. Everyone is polite, pleasant and knowledgeable. My rehab is very specific to me and my injury. The attention to detail on my exercises is like no other physical therapy I've experienced.

text.text: I Highly recommend Metro Sports Physical Therapy. Everyone is polite, pleasant and knowledgeable. My rehab is very specific to me and my injury. The attention to detail on my exercises is like no other physical therapy I've experienced.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Sejal, Lauren and Kim at Metrosports for the last 6 months post knee replacement surgery.  They have all been wonderful, challenging, supportive and educational and they have been key to my physical recovery.  My knee and leg feel strong, my balance is better than it has ever been and I am doing things that I haven’t been able to do in years now that I have strength and no pain.  I had a goal to go back to surfing lessons in October and found myself on a board in July!
